name: Goboscript integration
description: Integration with goboscript. Adds a decompile button the the project page, next to the Remix button.

settings.name: Ignore semver
settings.description: Ignore the meta.semver value in project.json when decompiling.

settings.name: Ignore vm
settings.description: Ignore the meta.vm value in project.json when decompiling.

settings.name: Begin filename with ID
settings.description: Inverts the shift+click decompile button behaviour, prepending the project id by default.

info.text: sb2gs: Holding shift while clicking the decompile button will prepend the project id.
